M

Mage - Class in thelastpromise
The class passes the location for the mage to be drawn and defines calls on its parent to allow the mage to move.
Mage(Location, Image) - Constructor for class thelastpromise.Mage
loc is the location that the mage will drawn on texture is an image of the mage that will be drawn on the location that is being passed.

Main - Class in thelastpromise
This main menu class presents the main credits page, and calls the loghandling class it also plays this- "src/TLPTheme Song.wav" - during the beginning.
